overview: This series brings you five-alarm action that's hotter than a flame-thrower. Featured cover girl Rae Lil Black has lost all affection for her boyfriend, but she lets him foot the bill for new experiences. On a vacation, she fulfills her burning desires with a stranger who measures up. Diamond Banks, Mina Von D, and Sonya Blaze are all sizzling up the screen.
title: Ignite 6
